Privacy Policy
Thank you for using this BMI Calculator app. Your privacy is important, and this policy explains how data is handled. 


1. Google Play Services
 - If you install this app via Google Play, Google may collect certain device and usage data, which is visible to me through the Google Play Console.
 - In case of a crash, some information may be automatically uploaded to Google.
 - I have no control over this data collection. Please review https://policies.google.com/privacy for details.


2. F-Droid Installations
 - If you install this app via F-Droid, I do not receive any usage or crash data.
 - Please refer to https://f-droid.org/en/about/ for details on their data handling.


3. Auto Backup by Google
 - If your device has **Auto Backup by Google** enabled, your selected system of units (metric/imperial) may be backed up to Google Drive.
 - More details can be found here: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/data/autobackup.


4. External Links
 - If you click on a link in the About screen, the website you visit may collect data about your device.
 - Please review the privacy policy of the respective website for details.


No personal data is collected, stored, or shared by this app beyond what is mentioned above.
